hadiths.text: Abu Umamah bin Sahl bin Hunaif said:"My father said: 'The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'Whoever goes out to his Masjid - the Masjid of Quba' and prays therein, that will be equivalent to 'Umrah

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ مَسْجِدِ قُبَاءٍ وَالصَّلاَةِ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of The Majid Of Quba' [1] And Praying Therein
